code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import CharacterCard from'../components/CharacterCard';import HomeNavbar from'../components/HomeNavbar';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CharacterPage=()=>{const[characters,setCharacters]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCharacters=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/characters');const data=await response.json();setCharacters(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching characters:',error);}};fetchCharacters();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeNavbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-auto py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-center mb-8",children:"Characters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex overflow-x-auto",children:characters.map(character=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CharacterCard,{imageUrl:character.imageUrl,name:character.name},character._id))})]})]});};export default CharacterPage;
